/tg/ Station 13 - Modules - Types — Var Details - Proc Details

antennae
/obj/item/organ/external/antennae

A moth's antennae

Vars

burntAre we burned?
original_spriteStore our old sprite here for if our antennae wings are healed

Procs

heal_antennaeheal our antennae back up!!
set_spriteFor moth antennae and wings we make an exception. If their features are burnt, we only update our original sprite
try_burn_antennaecheck if our antennae can burn off ;_;

Var Details

–

Are we burned?

Proc Details

proc
heal_antennae
()

heal our antennae back up!!

set_sprite
(sprite)

For moth antennae and wings we make an exception. If their features are burnt, we only update our original sprite

try_burn_antennae
(/mob/living/carbon/human/human)

check if our antennae can burn off ;_;
